div.p: A code describing where the dispensed medication is expected to be consumed or administered
This code system http://hl7.org/fhir/medication-dispense-category defines the following codes:

tr.td: Includes dispenses for medications to be administered or consumed in an inpatient or acute care setting
Includes dispenses for medications to be administered or consumed in an outpatient setting (for example, Emergency Department, Outpatient Clinic, Outpatient Surgery, Doctor's office)
Includes dispenses for medications to be administered or consumed by the patient in their home (this would include long term care or nursing homes, hospices, etc)

description.value: A code describing where the dispensed medication is expected to be consumed or administered

definition.value: Includes dispenses for medications to be administered or consumed in an inpatient or acute care setting
Includes dispenses for medications to be administered or consumed in an outpatient setting (for example, Emergency Department, Outpatient Clinic, Outpatient Surgery, Doctor's office)
Includes dispenses for medications to be administered or consumed by the patient in their home (this would include long term care or nursing homes, hospices, etc)
